# WidgetFamily.accessoryCircular

**Case**

A circular widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryCircular
```

## Discussion

The accessory circular widget can appear as a complication in watchOS, or on the Lock Screen in iOS and iPadOS.



## Accessing accessory families

- **WidgetFamily.accessoryCorner**: A widget-based complication in the corner of a watch face in watchOS.
- **WidgetFamily.accessoryRectangular**: A rectangular widget.
- **WidgetFamily.accessoryInline**: A flat widget that contains a single row of text and an optional image.
